name: VITATIO
detailed_description:
VITATIO is the latin word for avoidance and is the exact premise of this game, avoid collisions with opposing gems and guide your way to the highest score on the global leaderboards!

★ DIFFICULT GAMEPLAY!
Ridiculously hard at later levels, you will need to train your reaction speed and cunning to become the highest scorer

★ TRAIN YOUR REFLEXES!
VITATIO is a game that favours the strong minded, it will test your patience and every time you lose, you are becoming better!

★ ACHIEVEMENTS!
Over 40 achievements for you to unlock!

★ GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!
Do you have the fastest and best reflexes in the world? then prove it!

short_description: VITATIO is the latin word for avoidance and is the exact premise of this game, avoid collisions with opposing gems and guide your way to the highest score on the global leaderboards!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 and Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Graphics
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
